spatial_accuracy.notes: Major spatial failure in the bedroom wing; Bedroom 2 is detached and oriented horizontally instead of vertically. The garage is incorrectly placed adjacent to the bathroom/bedroom area instead of the rear. Many windows are missing, particularly in the living area where a door replaces the balcony exit.

structural_fidelity.notes: The internal hallway structure is broken; Bedroom 2 is not connected via the central corridor as specified in the plan. The balcony is missing entirely, replaced by a standard window and side door. The linen cupboard at entry is oversized.

furniture_mapping.notes: Kitchen cabinetry follows the general L-shape but the laundry appliances are incorrectly rendered as a sink unit. The 'Robe' in Bedroom 1 is halluncinated as a bulky kitchen-style unit.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with consistent isometric perspective, clean global illumination, and realistic materials. Visual clarity is excellent despite structural inaccuracy.

detected_errors.description: Missing Balcony structure at the rear of the Lounge.
Garage is misplaced adjacent to Bedroom 2 rather than standing separate or aligned with the side boundary.
Bedroom 2 rotated 90 degrees, breaking the rectangular footprint of the house.
Proportion of the Linen closet at entry is significantly larger than indicated on the 2D plan.
Hallucinated second door in the lounge area where a sliding door should be.
WC and Bathroom doors are missing their proper corridor orientation.
